ing.item: Boneless skinless chicken breast halves; (about 2 pounds)

directions.step:
1.Heat oven to 375F. In large skillet prepare RICE-A-RONI as package directs. Let cool 10 minutes.
2.Pound each chicken breast half to 1/4-inch thickness. Spoon 1/3 cup prepared RICE-A-RONI on each chicken breast half. Roll up chicken to completely enclose filling; secure with wooden toothpicks.
3.Dip chicken in milk; roll in bread crumbs. Arrange in 13 x 9-inch glass baking dish; set aside.
4.In small bowl, combine margarine, thyme and pepper; drizzle evenly over chicken. Bake 40 to 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Remove wooden toothpick before serving.
Recipe by: RICE-A-RONI®
Posted to brand-name-recipes by Barbra<barbra@pipeline.com> on Feb 04, 1998
